project5

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • project5.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserInterface

    public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUserInterface
    This class interacts with the user: requests input, reads in user input and uses the appropriate objects and methods to perform the required tasks.
    Author:
    PC
